title: C-rank Prime Core (Part 1)
body:
C-rank Prime Core (Part 1)

"Is something wrong?" asked Evan with a confused face.

'Everything is wrong' shouted a man inside his mind who looks to be in his late sixties.

"Hey kid, why don't you think about it for one more time, this is not a joking matter you know. You might lose your life inside" the man who just shouted inside his mind said while handing back a golden-coloured card to Evan.

"Thanks for your concern, but I have my own ways to ensure my safety," Evan said to the man.

'Besides, I am sure I will be safer inside rather than staying outside' he thought and walked forward.

"Sigh, young people these days are really stupid" the man muttered and stopped looking at Evan who was walking towards a dungeon portal.

'Monster paradise dungeon huh' Evan said inwardly after coming in front of the dungeon portal and stepped inside it without hesitation.
